reviews.review_msg: Travers is an amazing professor. Her critical analysis is on point. Her lectures are intellectually engaging. Her tests are really fair.  However, you have to be an exceptional student to get an A- or higher. If you are "Good", you will receive a B in the class. Highly recommend to take this class or any class with her.

Dominique is by far the best prof ive had in my 3 years at sfu. She is very passionate about the subject, has very enjoyable classes, is an extremely fair marker, and is very friendly towards students. This class was at the worst possible time (530 till 9 in surrey) but the commute from north van was worth it for this class. sfu needs more like her
This class changed my outlook and view on Sport.  She is one of the best instructors I have had in 8 years of post secondary, period.
